```{r}
### process missing value
### As all missing values occur in characteristics columns
### We choose to impute them using a special string `UNKNOWN`

df_fill_missing <- gsub("UNKNOWN", "", df)

# check if we've filled all the missing
sum(is.na(df_fill_missing))
```
